CatDescriptText: William A. (Gus) Greenlee and W. M. [Emmanuel] "Jew" McPhierson were listed in the 1948-1952 city directories as co-owners of the Crawford Grill at 1100 Pa. Avenue.  Both were heavily involved in the numbers and professional sports as well.
TitMainTitle: Emanuel "Jew" McPhierson, and Leonard "Big Bill" Williams, standing in front of porch, possibly of William "Woogie" Harris's house at 7101 Apple Street, Homewood
